item.title: U.S. Military Selects Little-Known Utah Supplier for Drone Program
item.description: The Army chose Teal Drones to provide thousands of reconnaissance aircraft, bypassing some of venture capital’s best-funded drone makers.

item.title: Google's $2 Billion Anthropic Investment Gets U.K. Antitrust Clearance
item.description: The Competition and Markets Authority said it wouldn’t open an in-depth investigation into Google’s investment in the AI startup.
